title: Orange ginger sponge pudding
ingredients: ['3 tablespoon golden syrup', '3 oranges', '115g/4 oz butter', '115g/4 oz light brown sugar', '1 large egg, made up to 300ml with orange juice', '175g/6 oz self raising flour, sifted', 'A pinch of salt', '1 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', 'A 2 1/2 pint (1.5 litre) pudding basin, lightly greased']
